website_summaries.verdict: The 2020 Apple iPhone SE is a petite powerhouse with no-compromise performance for hundreds of dollars less than other recent iPhones.

customer_reviews.title: SE Seriously for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in product red Comes with headphones Seriously fast phone Wireless charging is fast Battery is excellent Camera is so good For the price you can’t beat it It just works, Buy one :)
customer_reviews.author: JayniaK

customer_reviews.title: Beat value for money device Apple has ever made
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic performance for a £419 phone. You simply can't find an android phone that matches the performance.... I never thought I'd say that sentence in my lifetime. I was a iPhone user for 4-5 years, then moved to Android due to reasonable handset price. This is a game changer.... It really is.
customer_reviews.author: MR S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent update of the original SE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a friend who prefers smaller phones and still had the original iPhone SE. She thinks it’s great and even with the slight bigger screen size, she can hardly tell the difference with the phone being slimmer. She’s very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for people with small hands!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace ageing iPhone 5 that I bought as a reconditioned model from Amazon several years ago. The 2020 iPhone SE product red is fantastic, especially for people with small hands! It’s a similar width to the iPhone 5 but slightly longer and much slimmer. Easy to use and much less bulky than the iPhone XR (work phone). Love the fact that it was easy to transfer data from iPhone 5 and set up. Am also going to use apple pay as can then leave my purse at home! Colour is a nice bright red and I bought it together with an easy fit glass screen and transparent case. All in all excellent value for money and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Grizelda Wizzle

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is very bad. In 2020 you can’t have a phone with a battery life of half a day for this money, even if it is an Apple phone. You are paying a lot of money anyway, so go for an iphone 11.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Liguori

customer_reviews.title: Beat value for money device Apple has.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic performance for a £419 phone, you simply can't find an android phone that matches the performance. A single charge at night lasts all day long in to the evening in my experience. Coming from the iPhone 6, the screen is clearer and the touch screen is more sensitive. Also, due to the enhancements, navigating around iOS is extremely fast with no lags whatsoever. The iPhone SE is perfect for me. One-handed use, great little camera and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only had this phone a couple of hours and I’m already finding it to be absolutely brilliant. It’s extremely fast and setting it up was super easy definitely worth £419 👍
customer_reviews.author: Ewan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nothing new but that’s fine with me
customer_reviews.text: It’s nothing spectacular but it’s a good upgrade for me as I was on the iPhone 7 with a busted camera and a battery that required charging multiple times a day. I’ve noticed an improvement in speed and the camera quality is very good. If you’re looking for a simple easy to use phone with the operating system you know and love this is the phone for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting much for £400, but the phone is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: iPhone SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Just knocked out by it! Lovely and smooth operation. has everything I need from a phone without being too big. First brand new iPhone I've ever purchased, as I've always bought second hand before. Works great with my drones too :)
customer_reviews.author: MODEA

customer_reviews.title: Great up to date iPhone for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this iPhone 2 days ago and absolutely love it. I’ve had a a mixture of iPhone 6s and 7s over the last few years and wanted to upgrade but keep the home button. When Apple announced the SE I was very pleased. It’s just like having my old 7 (which I loved) but with the speed and beauty of an iPhone 11. And the price!! Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: The Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but poor WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Great phone with one really annoying problem it has really poor WiFi it just constantly loses WiFi signal I have a few phones and this one is the only one that does it hoping the new iOS 14 update sorts the problem apart from that love everything great camera battery easily last me a whole day although I’m not a gamer and I love the size being able to reach all corners of the screen again it’s small and light I keep checking my pocket to make sure it’s still there has wireless charging too
customer_reviews.author: Andrew smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone! IOS is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as birthday present for wife. She absolutely loves it. She downgraded from 6" screen and prefers this. Battery is adequate for your daily social media, youtube etc. Def not for gaming as you will cringe when the battery dies in the middle of it. Its a good utilitarian phone. I will buy one when my 6s gives up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Jahagirdar

customer_reviews.title: It’s an iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much everything I expected but it does seem a lot more snappier in the apps than what I’m used to. Just nice to have a bit more quality and assurance compared to an android phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apple I phone SE
customer_reviews.text: My I phone 6s went on the blink, would not charge anymore. Read the reviews on the I phone SE, Excellent phone, easy to use, single charge at night lasts all day long in to the evening. Same processor as the i phone 11 at a fraction of the price. Liked it as exactly same size as my 6S and fits in my pocket. Camera not quite up to the 11 but considering your getting a phone for just over 400 quid was an absolute bargain. Managed to swap over no problem using the blue tooth feature. From opening the packet I was fully operational in under 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Apple have done it again
customer_reviews.text: Just what you’d expect from apple iPhone. Just stepped up from the iPhone 6 and even though the size is the same the phone is a lot better to use and look at. The screen is clearer and the touch screen is more sensitive. I would recommend this phone
customer_reviews.author: Neil Venturelli-Stedman

customer_reviews.title: Just the same as my 6S ALMOST
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this model because the 6S which I owned from new it’s probably going to be the next iPhone that is dropped by Apple for updates and operating system et cetera so I invested in a 2020 SE And have just finished transferring my phone from one to another and to be honest it’s pretty disappointing the screen is no better or worse than the 6S speed is exactly the same as the 6S honestly totally disappointed but at least it’s new wouldn’t recommend it to anyone unless you’ve got a very very old phone you need replacing cheaply
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Very fast phone very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone very fast It’s not actually a duel sim phone it takes one nano sim and an esim (electronic sim) that that some networks like BT don’t support ! The phone only works in portrait with people not animals the may be an update in the future that may cover this. Battery life is ok better than my old iohone 6 it all depends how you use it. WiFi and Bluetooth is much improved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iphone SE 100%
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought there was something wrong with thge phone and was going to cancel it.. BUT.. THERE WAS'NT SOOOO I love it andf it works great with my Roland Go snth and app ;D 100% to the seller.. I also bought an Iwatch 3 and works great with that. its just getting use to changing from Andrid To Apple.. 100% to seller and Apple I love the products.. thank you so muach guys kind regards mark PE2 8QZ
customer_reviews.author: Mark  R Slater

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone  💕
customer_reviews.text: My phone arrived by midday and the packaging was excellent a box within a box with some padding around the phone the phone itself is gorgeous, it is eye candy. It is lightning fast and has a great camera and full of features and lightweight would recommend it to iPhone lovers. Delivery was quick
customer_reviews.author: Vic hall.

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Broken when arrived to unable to fully review. Always had iPhones in the past so was expecting great things. Just felt a bit of a toy product.
customer_reviews.author: BHD

customer_reviews.title: Overall good value for money
customer_reviews.text: When i opened the box i noticed there was something which looked like bubbles under the glass, around the speaker. At first i thought it was the plastic which covers the screen, although when i removed it this was still there. If i hadn't bought it right away i would've assumed it was used already. Besides that, its very powerful and good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Doño

customer_reviews.title: WYSIWYG
customer_reviews.text: What a seamless transfer form my tired Iphone 7 to this model. The data transfer thingy works so well now. Amazing Arm strap for running fits perfectly Bicycle mount fits perfect. I am so happy with this transition and the pricepoint. FaceID would have been the double cherry
customer_reviews.author: Marcel M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic spec and price, especially for an apple product. Cant really go wrong, perfect phone for most peoples needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave UK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing iphone for 2020
customer_reviews.text: I love this iphone. Upgraded from my iphone SE 1st generation 2016 and it's an impressive device. 64 GB so plently storage space for me......looks just amazing and the larger screen is a huge improvement on the earlier model. It's so much faster too with the A13 chip inside! Extremely easy to set up using itunes back up to restore the data, settings, music, contacts etc. from my old phone. This iphone SE 2020 is the best for today and all you need!!
customer_reviews.author: Rozzenation

customer_reviews.title: Best Apple phone yet .
customer_reviews.text: Love the colour choice mine is red . Camera very good with instructions how to use it . A nice size overall and slim . Best Apple phone
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Gould

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best phone
customer_reviews.text: Notification not visible till 6-digit unlock, maps and navigation not any near as great as Google - android auto is a lot better than Apple Carplay, Health app fell short of features of Samsung health. iCloud drive available for backup is only 5G free thereafter you pay some money per month endlessly. I have 2 Apple devices using the same 5G cloud allowance so it fills up in minutes. In my view Apple is too rich not to give a bit more cloud allowance per device. Now I have fear of loading more apps. Arrgh!!!Just generally not chuffed with this 'smartphone'.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, awful seller
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, but the seller is horrendous. Bought two of those same phones, one arrived one day late, another about two weeks late...
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Clarke

customer_reviews.title: iphone SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daugher as she needed to upgrade from iphone 6 this fits the bill, shes happy with it plus 128 GB of storage..wont take her long to fill that up ! (I perfer samsung personally )
customer_reviews.author: Kempy

customer_reviews.title: shocked at how good it is
customer_reviews.text: some of the reviews made this phone seem like it was exactly the same as the old one but i dont think it is! the original seemed to be squarer and chunky whereas this new model seems sleek and nice in the hand. I have this as a second phone (work phone) as i had 2 iphone 11 pro's but carrying to larger phones was a pain and my son stole one of the pros lol short story is i am well impressed, it looks slick, performs awesome and happy i bought it
customer_reviews.author: Dazbo

customer_reviews.title: Screen freeze
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my iPhone10 keeps freezing and I’m not able to unlock it for days. This one has already started freezing up on the screen from day 1 so I’m wondering how long before I have the same scenario
customer_reviews.author: sarah herts

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband fantastic iPhone camera not as good as mine (iPhone 11) but everything else just as good and a brilliant price!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Quality iPhone
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful formed iPhone. Top quality and should last my wife for at least 5yrs as it has the latest A Chip set and is future proofed for at least this amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Squaddie...

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Used to Have The Smaller IPhone 5, This Is Much Better. Same Size as iPhone 6. Red is Gorgeous, Sound Bigger and Headphones Just as Good.😀
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, doesn't feel 'budget' at all
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this phone - I have been using Android Huawei phone for the past 3 years and am really pleased that I decided to return to iPhone with this one. It feels extremely natural and easy to use in one hand and I have small hands, but never once have I thought the screen was too small. Pairs flawlessly with AirPods, Apple Watch and Mac as you would expect. Excellent value for money - I was considering an iPhone 11 but the minimal additional features for so much extra cost just wasn't worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Overall very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with the phone for the price. Obviously it isn't as amazing as the iPhone 11, but that's expected for the £300 cheaper price tag. The best I would describe it is an iPhone 8 with the speed of an iPhone 11.
customer_reviews.author: Monty Allen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is amazing! And the overall product is so good! Came with all its original packaging and was untouched! Is definitely worth a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Paige hill

customer_reviews.title: Very please with my new iPhone. A great price for the newest edition.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this latest addition to the iPhone family. Lightning quick and pleasantly surprised with the excellent camera. 5*
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Best option under £500
customer_reviews.text: This phone is snappy and comfortable to hold.I have a iPhone XS but that recently broke so I decided to buy this phone until the iPhone 12s come out and it was a good idea.The colour red is the best option in opinion
customer_reviews.author: Kean

customer_reviews.title: Red phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone in red love the colour. It was packaged very well. The camera is very good. Battery is not bad as long as you dont be on social media all day. On the whole though i love this phone small and cute.
customer_reviews.author: anneesa

customer_reviews.title: Superb value iPhone SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: Pre ordered this iPhone and delivery was excellent. Great value iPhone which is simple to use and works very well-would rate this an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money but not the best iPhone out there
customer_reviews.text: Great phone with a lot of memory and the latest technology. Just a bit glitchy sometimes (screen freezes) but in terms of value for money, wont find a phone on the market with the same capabilities for this price
customer_reviews.author: Charissa KMH

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and good price
customer_reviews.text: I switched from an iPhone 6s to this new SE and it is amazing. What a great battery life improvement. The phones are pretty much exactly the same in size, but the main difference is definitely the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jelle

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and it worked straight from the box! Would highly recommend especially after having had a bad experience with another online retailer during the pandemic. After being left without a phone, Amazon saved the day!
customer_reviews.author: Andreea

customer_reviews.title: Terrible front cam/Buzzing when using front cam
customer_reviews.text: Terrible front cam. When you records video, it is always buzzing. I Just tested last night. I doubt it's a renewed phone but sold as a new phone due to its abysmal front cam performance. Have to return it! See attached video as an evidence. To be fair, I've also tested it this morning with my another iPhone, the same problem with this Iphone se.
customer_reviews.author: Lol

customer_reviews.title: I’m buzzing pal!
customer_reviews.text: M8 this phone is class. Upgraded from the original SE as the battery life and touch screen was knackered. Was a spur of the moment purchase but buzzing I did it. Delivery was v quick. Gan get yeself one hew
customer_reviews.author: Dazzy

customer_reviews.title: Greetings
customer_reviews.text: Like to size medium better for me to easy carry and lighting and wireless charger greeting it technology!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Greetings

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money and the functionality and performance speed is up to expectations
customer_reviews.author: Moosa Mijadh Numan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, husbands made up with his gift. Everything seems great on the phone nothing seems budget about it. Also you get 1 year free apple tv which is a bonus i didnt know about. Great price for a brand new iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a IPhone SE for a number of years, decided it was time to upgrade to SE2. Totally love the phone!
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good standard phone. Very good for people who likes the home button on iPhones while still having a new phone feel. Everything works well and fast. Little issues on mine such as touch screen in one area of the phone sometimes not working, and the flash while the camera is on does not work but I don’t think this is the case with all phones of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best phones that you can get for Michael that is great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best phones that you can get for Michael that is great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Ash M

customer_reviews.title: camera  pictures are a lot clearer than previous model plus black /white which found intersting
customer_reviews.text: Used day to day texting /internet facebook ect Found easy to use just what i needed c gregory
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iPhone SE 64 review
customer_reviews.text: I’m just happy to have an Apple phone that I feel is simple to use and the ease just makes life easier to
customer_reviews.author: emz & co

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality And Fast Performance
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality And Fast Performance Iphone Real value for the price !
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge change in user experience from my S5 apart from better camera. I had to upgrade as the battery was beginning to fail on my S5.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Go for it fabbo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fab 13 year old very happy with her shiny new phone..
customer_reviews.author: Kadie adamson

customer_reviews.title: I 'upgraded' from the 7 and can definitely say the 7 is better.
customer_reviews.text: I 'upgraded' from the 7 and can definitely say the 7 is better.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad phone especially for the price, although didn’t quite like the old iPhone design and no Face ID. However for the price it is good in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Bernie holt

customer_reviews.title: Unable to download data from my previous phone
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a new phone because apple no longer serviced my previous one. This one is bigger and more fiddly to use. Also in spite of being on the phone for 3 hours at least, I could not download my data.
customer_reviews.author: Tadeusz K.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and low price
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone is perfect for people who don't care to get the last powerful camera. Excellent in all
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo

customer_reviews.title: A good phone
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for somebody who is not technically wise
customer_reviews.author: AMO123

customer_reviews.title: I bought one for my wife and then this one for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacements for my old iPhone 5 and my wife's Galaxy.
customer_reviews.author: snug

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable value for money !!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, everything is perfect !! Great little gadget
customer_reviews.author: maria bosher

customer_reviews.title: Customer service easy to reach
customer_reviews.text: Awaiting refund for product, product did not arrive correctly. Customer service was helpful. Hopefully I’ll receive my refund soon..
customer_reviews.author: Luke Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Although I had wanted to pay over 5 months was charged for full amount
customer_reviews.author: Janice Ferdinand

customer_reviews.title: One day battery life with tough use
customer_reviews.text: Today I used chat, emailing, browsing, the device was connected to bluetooth speaker and streaming radio for few hours, I took few calls, used few more apps, and took photos and the battery is still at about 1/3 level.
customer_reviews.author: Attila S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight and a good size for pocket or handbag
customer_reviews.author: MISS J S COE

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: from iphone 7 which ive loved to 2020 SE brilliant phone
customer_reviews.author: Mrs n kliszat

customer_reviews.title: A quality phone at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: iPhone do not allow text message delivery notification. Apart from that I am highly pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: No headphones in the box even though it clearly states they are contained.
customer_reviews.text: Phone seems OK. Bought as a gift for the boss (i.e. wife). she spotted straight away that the box contained no headphones even though it clearly states they are part of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: This iPhone is quick, stylist and overall a great product
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone SE is a brilliant phone, that allows you to do everything that the more expensive iPhones can do, but at a lower price. It’s stylist, easy to use and really responsive. I would highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Colour
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but i asked for a white phone and although the box states white the actual phone is black. as i needed the phone i have set it up
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Sharon Chapple

customer_reviews.title: Great I phone SE
customer_reviews.text: Great iPhone, good quality and high standard for the price, ideal for teenage son without the high cost of the I11 etc
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jeanes

customer_reviews.title: Sound of videos
customer_reviews.text: I cannot not hear well, the sound of the video is default, too low
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Medina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, very impressed with this! Just ordered a case to go with it, very excited to have my phone be complete :)
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Smith

customer_reviews.title: New iPhone SE
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from an old 5S so very pleased with the modern technology!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mal

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPhone SE Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant update from my iPhone 6 👍 absolutely love the iPhone SE
customer_reviews.author: Joe Drumm

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived all fine happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Had it researched prior to buying its for personal use. Good device.
customer_reviews.author: Denis O Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: fast
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest iPhone in history and I like it. Response fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jie Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good service from amazon happy with iPhone se good price
customer_reviews.author: Mickey mouse

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Best iPhone made it , i'm very happy... good price
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Tocila

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product and easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: John Cantle

customer_reviews.title: Not better than an iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my iPhone 6 which needed a battery replacement which I couldn’t get due to lockdown without sending it away leaving me without a phone. It is very similar to the iPhone 6 but not as good. It has a few extra features but nothing that is useful or necessary. The camera is a little better than the 6 but i prefer to use a real camera rather than the restrictive capabilities of any phone camera. The home button is garbage. It doesn’t feel right and the phone doesn’t always react the same. Playing music through the phone’s speaker is terrible. All in all I am very unimpressed and wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Want the best, Apple.
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a Apple phone, but usually a top end one. But I wanted one that fitted in my breast pocket or trouser pocket without it feeling oversized. So I opted for this one. As far as I’m concerned it’s perfect, and has all the functions I need. The price is very good, I am very pleased I bought this one, and saved a lot of money against buying a top end one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great little phone.
customer_reviews.text: A great little phone if little is what you want. Fits really well in my jean pocket and typing is easy on this phone. I wanted a phone that I could carry about anywhere hence why I went for this phone. You can get better specs for the money but all I want is a phone that does the basics very well without the bulk. Battery life is ok but not super. I'm happy with it. Plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: NICK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone!
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is unsure about purchasing this phone, 100% do it! Everything about it is amazing. Very fast, great camera and just all round the best iPhone I have owned. I thought going back to an SE was maybe a big step back. Not at all!!! Phenomenal phone.
customer_reviews.author: pompey3325

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is great because being a techno phobe it looks and feels like my old iPhone.... so able to navigate the basics quite happily and very pleased with the extra tech. Brilliant and fast efficient delivery to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne E. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother as an upgrade to her original Iphone SE and it was both cheaper and quicker to buy through Amazon than in the stores here in Ireland. The phone arrived within a week and was a doddle to transfer everything across from her older phone. The display is great - having the 'larger format' option is super for older users, and the new 'portrait' option in camera mode also deserves to be mentioned - really makes the human photos "pop" compared to the background.
customer_reviews.author: Symphony

customer_reviews.title: Great value phone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a ‘treat’ for the wife (eek), great phone. She had the old style SE and wanted something bigger, but keeping the Touch ID. This thing is so much quicker, faster and nippier than my old 8 Plus, teeny bit jealous... It’s basically got the internals of the most recent gen iPhones and for the price; it’s spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: iPhone SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ever phone I had an old se which my husband now has and is. very pleased with that. I would mention be careful picking a screen protector as the ones I got does not fit and covered mic coul not hear a thing. I phoned apple and they did not pick up on this and said it was a hardware problem. I was prepared to send it back but tried it without protector and it worked fine so be very careful. Would recommend this phone to anyone
customer_reviews.author: S. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for 2nd hand iPhone 8, but ridiculous prices, saw this in warehouse, over £100 off new, like new. But nothing noticeably faster than my old work iPhone 8 which had been returned on leaving. Happy, as latest iPhone and should be good for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Battery goes down even when turned off
customer_reviews.text: I have had no product support this cost over 450 pounds never held a charge from day one and now I am being told its too late to send back , bought better phones second hand rubish
customer_reviews.author: charlie linesman

customer_reviews.title: One happy wife.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's birthday and she loves it, she has always had I phones and she is really happy with this phone, easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Colin bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great love my SE phone
customer_reviews.text: I use my SE Apple Phone mostly texting and photos it’s quicker than my previous phone. I love it and I am pleased with all it does for me. It has many good qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Phyl

customer_reviews.title: As people say, Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an Android device that was only a few months old, and had been returned under warranty. Had previous problems with my previous Android - I should have learned :( Expensive, but does what it says with ease
customer_reviews.author: Palcou

customer_reviews.title: As a phone - Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Finding it difficult to get the compass to calibrate. Downloaded SkyTrackerLite App, but doesn't seem to work well with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Size suits me fine but it’s a slipper little sucker in my sausage fingers. Needed a case.
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and speed of operation. Browsing the web is effortless and using apps seems much faster Han my old 6s. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: G Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is better than the 7 or 8
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone, but to be honest I cannot tell any difference in speed and overall use from my old iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mathew

customer_reviews.title: New iPhone for great price
customer_reviews.text: No difference in the iPhone 7 I had and have now given to one of the kids Great price , great camera and easy to use phone
customer_reviews.author: Jannyapple

product_meta.title: New Apple iPhone SE (64GB) - Black
feature_bullets: Water and dust resistant (1 meter for up to 30 minutes, IP67)
12MP Wide camera; Portrait mode, Portrait Lighting, Depth Control, next-generation Smart HDR, and 4K video
7MP front camera with Portrait mode, Portrait Lighting, and Depth Control
Touch ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay
A13 Bionic chip with third-generation Neural Engine
iOS with Dark Mode, new tools for editing photos and video, and new privacy features
